item.title: Meta refuses to sign EU’s AI code of practice
item.description: Meta will not sign the EU's new rules, calling the implementation "over-reach"

item.title: Netflix starts using GenAI in its shows and films
item.description: Netflix said it used gen AI for the first time for a scene in an Argentinean show called El Atonata.

item.title: Perplexity sees India as a shortcut in its race against OpenAI
item.description: Perplexity is quietly expanding into India to compete with OpenAI in the next phase of AI adoption.

item.title: ‘Utopian’ city California Forever announces huge tech manufacturing park
item.description: Solano Foundry is a 2,100-acre manufacturing park that can host 40 million square feet of advanced tech manufacturing space.

item.title: Anthropic tightens usage limits for Claude Code – without telling users
item.description: Claude Code users have been hit with unexpectedly restrictive usage limits. The problems, many of which have been aired on Claude Code’s GitHub page, ...
